entities.name: goblin
entities.description: The goblin is a character in the story who is sitting cross-legged in a low chair and drumming its arms with his spindly fingers. ("I have reached my decision, Harry Potter," said the goblin...).

entities.name: gringotts
entities.description: Gringotts is a bank where goblins work. (The goblins of Gringotts will consider it base treachery...)

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the main character in the story who is being helped by the goblin. ("I have reached my decision, Harry Potter," said the goblin...).

entities.name: griphook
entities.description: Griphook is a specific goblin who is helping Harry Potter. ("I have reached my decision, Harry Potter," said Griphook...)

entities.name: godric griffindor
entities.description: Godric Gryffindor is the owner of a sword that Griphook wants. ("I want the sword of Godric Gryﬃndor," said the goblin...)

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is Harry's friend who offers to give something else to Griphook. ("We can give you something else," said Ron eagerly.)

relationships.description: Griphook is an employee of Gringotts. (The goblins of Gringotts will consider it base treachery...)
Griphook is helping Harry Potter. ("I have reached my decision, Harry Potter," said the goblin...).
Griphook wants something from Godric Gryffindor. ("I want the sword of Godric Gryﬃndor," said the goblin...)
Ron is offering an alternative to Griphook. ("We can give you something else," said Ron eagerly.)
